errors.title: TBI error during function chdir
errors.cause: Occurs with the call AUTgetHWObjects. There should be an AUT API tracer in the meantime.
errors.solution: Not explicitly provided in the document.

errors.title: CPU connection limitation
errors.cause: Attempt to connect CPUs through unsupported bus type
errors.solution: Split data paths into separate circuits using only one bus type per circuit

errors.title: CPU information unreadable
errors.cause: Module not properly configured or addressed
errors.solution: Check logical address, slot configuration, and module status

errors.title: PG-module connection failure
solution: Set module to correct operating mode
Verify and correct MPI address in STEP 7 configuration

errors.title: Station generation error
solution: Remove write protection from project directory

errors.title: Inconsistent hardware configuration
errors.cause: Configuration mismatch in programming device
errors.solution: Run 'Check Consistency' in HW Config and verify S7TMP folder settings

errors.title: SDB interpretation error
errors.cause: Inconsistent HW configuration in module from previous loading
errors.solution: Install required options package for configuring specific modules

errors.title: Slave slot limit exceeded
errors.cause: More slaves configured than permitted by master system
errors.solution: Split slaves across different segments or reduce number of slaves

errors.title: Multicomputing type error
errors.cause: Error in HW Config of first 4.02.x version
errors.solution: Add another CPU and delete it to reset to single-computing

errors.title: Missing master system for DP slave
errors.cause: Master system not assigned to DP slave
errors.solution: Right-click to add master system and reconfigure CP as slave

errors.title: Address conflict
errors.cause: Entered address already occupied
errors.solution: Confirm suggested address or enter new address

errors.title: Invalid module insertion
errors.cause: Attempt to connect non-DP slave device directly to DP bus
errors.solution: Insert hierarchy level for device as DP slave in HW catalog

errors.title: Slot limit exceeded
errors.cause: Maximum number of modules already configured
errors.solution: Delete slaves or their modules to free up slots

errors.title: Offline/online configuration mismatch
errors.cause: External module from Phoenix company slotted
errors.solution: Remove external module (error can be ignored)

errors.title: Update blocked
errors.cause: GSE/type files referenced in open STEP 7 applications
errors.solution: Close station windows and other STEP 7 applications accessing GSD files

errors.title: GSE file syntax error
errors.cause: GSD file contains errors (e.g., name >23 characters)
errors.solution: Edit GSD file to correct syntax errors and re-incorporate

errors.title: Module restart error
cause: Not all CPUs of multicomputing station started
CPU/FM key switch in STOP position
CP operating mode switch in STOP position
solution: Start all modules of multicomputing station
Set CP operating mode to RUN

errors.title: SDB 7XX load failure
errors.cause: High-availability S7 connection configuration changed in STEP 7 V5.1
errors.solution: Delete System Data folder and regenerate in NetPro

errors.title: Debug info limit reached
errors.cause: Max debug info length (64KB) exceeded due to excessive DB accesses
errors.solution: Reduce debug info by limiting data block accesses

errors.title: Parameter control error
cause: No module available for operand outside process image
DB not in CPU or write-protected
solution: Comment out problematic line in VAT
Load DB into CPU or remove write protection

errors.title: I/O control restriction
errors.cause: Attempt to control/monitor I/Os in Process Mode
errors.solution: Monitor process image or switch CPU to Test Mode

errors.title: Block interface changed
errors.cause: Parameters not transferred properly after interface change
errors.solution: Update block call to match new interface (Edit>Block Call>Update)

errors.title: Timestamp mismatch
errors.cause: Type object has different timestamp than opened block
errors.solution: Ensure block consistency between online/offline versions

errors.title: STL generation error
cause: STL source exists and is write-protected

errors.title: Block version mismatch
errors.cause: Offline block doesn't match CPU block (timestamp difference)
errors.solution: Download displayed block to CPU or update offline version

errors.title: Parameter name conflict
errors.cause: Timestamp conflict between block interface and parameter descriptions
errors.solution: Ensure interface changes are properly saved and loaded

errors.title: STL source generation failure
errors.cause: Protected blocks in selection list
errors.solution: Regenerate selection list excluding protected blocks

errors.title: Block existence check
errors.cause: Need to verify block exists both online and offline
errors.solution: Save project under different name

errors.title: Invalid operation position
errors.cause: Programming error
errors.solution: Correct the code

errors.title: Missing type object
errors.cause: Block's type object not available
errors.solution: Ensure associated function block exists for instance DBs

errors.title: PG resource error
errors.cause: High resource usage during program status monitoring
errors.solution: Use status function from offline project

errors.title: Action execution blocked
cause: Communications module busy with other settings

errors.title: Function unavailable
errors.cause: Requested function not available in S7-DOS or CPU
errors.solution: Reinstall STEP 7

errors.title: Function not implemented
errors.cause: Internal error
errors.solution: Delete metafiles

errors.title: System error
errors.cause: Attempt to get online as normal user under WinNT
errors.solution: Use administrator rights

errors.title: Mixed installation error
errors.cause: Incompatible versions installed
errors.solution: Manually deinstall STEP 7 and S7 options packages

errors.title: EPROM driver unsupported
errors.cause: Registry entry issues with programming interface
errors.solution: Delete incorrect registry directories (MCDCENT/MCDPG)

errors.title: External prommer connection
cause: Prommer not connected to configured LPT
solution: Set LPT to EPP in BIOS

errors.title: S7OTBL server error
errors.cause: S7DOS server (S7otblsx.exe/S7otbxsx.exe) not starting
errors.solution: Check server files in path and shared memory allocation

errors.title: STEP 7 frame timeout
errors.cause: Monitoring time for STEP 7 telegram expired
errors.solution: Check bus parameters and retry connection

errors.title: Telegram configuration error
errors.cause: Incorrect telegram configuration during TeleService
errors.solution: Check modem connections and compatibility

errors.title: Online connection interrupted
errors.cause: Communication failure
errors.solution: Check network connections and retry

errors.title: Station address mismatch
errors.cause: MPI address differs from actual network configuration
errors.solution: Verify MPI address settings and network configuration

errors.title: Connection rejected
solution: Configure CPU as DP master and load SDBs

errors.title: Station offline
solution: Verify baud rate and highest station address

errors.title: Function unsupported
errors.cause: No user connected to CP 5412 A2 with 'only master' setting
errors.solution: Connect user to establish connection

errors.title: No active contact
solution: Verify TS adapter power and settings

errors.title: No hardware found
errors.cause: No driver selected or incorrect MPI address area
errors.solution: Select/add driver in PG/PC interface settings

errors.title: Driver configuration error
errors.cause: Invalid registry parameters or driver issues
errors.solution: Delete unnecessary drivers and reinstall/parameterize

errors.title: Subnet configuration error
solution: Select different interrupt for MPI card

errors.title: Address conflict
errors.cause: TS adapter using default MPI address (0)
errors.solution: Assign unique MPI address to TS adapter

errors.title: Driver load failure
errors.cause: Communication driver file not found
errors.solution: Select card or install driver

errors.title: Logical device missing
errors.cause: Registry entry missing or driver version mismatch
errors.solution: Verify registry entries and driver versions

errors.title: Adapter version mismatch
errors.cause: Incompatible adapter/driver versions
errors.solution: Check adapter type and driver compatibility

errors.title: TS adapter communication
solution: Configure TS adapter in PG/PC interface

errors.title: Port in use
errors.cause: Another application using COM/USB port
errors.solution: Exit conflicting application or correct COM interface settings

errors.title: Driver in use
errors.cause: Serial driver reserved by another application
errors.solution: Close TeleService/STEP 7 and restart in correct order

errors.title: Modem connection required
errors.cause: TS adapter set for modem connection but none established
errors.solution: Establish modem connection or reselect available users

errors.title: Resource limitation
errors.cause: Too few resources available during block read
errors.solution: Start trace for diagnosis

errors.title: Illegal service request
solution: Check block call in user program

errors.title: Unsupported service
errors.cause: Module doesn't support requested service
errors.solution: Check CPU restrictions and module documentation

errors.title: RAM to ROM failure
errors.cause: Module doesn't support RAM to ROM function
errors.solution: Use more powerful module

errors.title: Data error (D043)
errors.cause: Too many control jobs sent to CPU
errors.solution: Reduce control job frequency

errors.title: Resource error (D062)
errors.cause: Job list full - VAT not closed properly
errors.solution: Power cycle CPU and delete unnecessary jobs

errors.title: Resource error (D063)
errors.cause: Trigger event occupied - irregular process termination
errors.solution: Disconnect cable and restart programming device

errors.title: Module restriction
errors.cause: Requested function exceeds module capabilities
errors.solution: Check module performance data and documentation

errors.title: Module busy
errors.cause: Module assigning parameters to subordinate devices
errors.solution: Reset CP via Online HW Config or remove bus cable during download

errors.title: DIOSDB structure error
errors.cause: Diagnostics address outside valid range
errors.solution: Change diagnostics address

errors.title: CPU type mismatch
errors.cause: Incompatible CPU type or internal structure error
errors.solution: Match configured and actual CPU types, regenerate configuration

errors.title: Coordination error (D204)
errors.cause: Variable table open during system data load
errors.solution: Close variable table and retransfer system data

errors.title: Protocol mismatch
errors.cause: S7DOS and CP protocol versions incompatible
errors.solution: Upgrade CP to version supporting RPC 7 protocol

errors.title: Invalid handle
errors.cause: Monitoring empty network
errors.solution: Delete empty network

errors.title: Element not found
errors.cause: Element missing in referenced database
errors.solution: Check search key spelling and database reference

errors.title: Compiler error
errors.cause: General compilation failure
errors.solution: Review code for errors

errors.title: Variable name conflict
errors.cause: Attempt to rename to existing variable name
errors.solution: Choose unique name

errors.title: Reference data generation
errors.cause: Database error
errors.solution: Use 'Save As with reorganization'

errors.title: Protected modules
errors.cause: Reference modules are know-how protected
errors.solution: Deactivate 'Include reference blocks' option

errors.title: Symbol assignment changed
errors.cause: Copied symbolic block between projects
errors.solution: Generate STL source with absolute addressing first

errors.title: Invalid block call
errors.cause: Instance DB type mismatch in symbol list
errors.solution: Enter instance DB of FB type in symbol list

errors.title: Program distribution
errors.cause: Program too large for single block
errors.solution: Distribute program across multiple blocks

errors.title: Missing PLC type
errors.cause: Called/addressed block not available
errors.solution: Compile block first or copy SFB/SFC from library

errors.title: Protected block
errors.cause: Attempt to generate KNOW_HOW_PROTECT block to STL
errors.solution: Exclude protected blocks from generation

errors.title: Parameter mismatch
errors.cause: Declaration range mismatch between formal/actual parameters
errors.solution: Use temporary static variable for parameter transfer

errors.title: Comment order
errors.cause: Parameter exchange affecting comment assignment
errors.solution: Maintain parameter declaration order when commenting

errors.title: Module unreachable
errors.cause: PG connected to MPI when CPU requires PROFIBUS
errors.solution: Set MPI driver to PROFIBUS and connect via DP

errors.title: Environment error
errors.cause: Multiple SIMATIC Manager instances
errors.solution: Delete S7CacheA.dat/S7ser.dat in S7met directory

errors.title: SCL object deleted
errors.cause: Exported source deleted then reimported
errors.solution: Delete block in SIMATIC Manager before compiling

errors.title: Object not found
errors.cause: Criteria-specified object unavailable
errors.solution: Reorganize addresses with CTRL+ALT+F11

errors.title: Invalid objects
errors.cause: Lost link in project
errors.solution: Use 'Save As with Reorganization'

errors.title: Irreparable system error
errors.cause: Critical internal failure
errors.solution: Restart application/Windows or contact support

errors.title: Registry error
errors.cause: Invalid/missing registry entry during TeleService
errors.solution: Retry connection for better line quality

errors.title: Invalid pointer
errors.cause: PLCSIM simulation data mismatch
errors.solution: Create new simulation via Simulation > New PLC

errors.title: Internal system error
errors.cause: Possible project damage
errors.solution: Restart application/Windows or send project to support

errors.title: Programming error
errors.cause: Unrecoverable system error during programming
errors.solution: Check for ProjID.pro file after dearchiving

errors.title: Symlist.dbf error
errors.cause: Project damage from crash
errors.solution: Use 'Save as with consistency check' or recreate project

errors.title: Write protection
errors.cause: Files/data blocks write-protected
errors.solution: Ensure write access to directories/drives

errors.title: Object locked
errors.cause: Object opened by another application/user
errors.solution: Close other applications before reorganizing

errors.title: Naming format
errors.cause: Invalid name format in SIMATIC Manager
errors.solution: Use correct naming convention (e.g., VAT<digit>)

errors.title: Version incompatibility
errors.cause: Legacy XUTIL catalog from V2
errors.solution: Delete XUTIL directory in project path

errors.title: Read-only data
solution: Disable virus scanner during STEP 7 operation

errors.title: Directory write rights
errors.cause: Write-protected directory or insufficient space
errors.solution: Remove write protection and ensure adequate disk space

errors.title: Offline folder issues
errors.cause: Incompatible options package versions
errors.solution: Check package versions and use 'Save as with reorganization'

errors.title: Missing authorization
errors.cause: No STEP 7 basic license installed
errors.solution: Install Basic Authorization

errors.title: Options package license
errors.cause: Missing options package authorization
errors.solution: Install from authorization disk or use emergency license

errors.title: Access denied
errors.cause: Repeated program loading attempts
errors.solution: Start 'Server' service in Control Panel

errors.title: Version-specific license
errors.cause: Missing STEP 7 V4.x authorization or long path
errors.solution: Install correct license or shorten project path

errors.title: Server load failure
errors.cause: Missing/incompatible options package or mixed installation
errors.solution: Install required package or reinstall STEP 7

errors.title: Undeclared object type
errors.cause: Missing file for required object processing
errors.solution: Install needed options package

errors.title: Unrepresentable object
errors.cause: Object requiring uninstalled options package
errors.solution: Install missing S7 options package

errors.title: Unprocessable objects
errors.cause: Outdated/missing options package version
errors.solution: Install current options package version

errors.title: Environment creation
errors.cause: Multiple SIMATIC Manager instances or crash
errors.solution: Delete *.dat files in S7met directory

errors.title: Link insertion
errors.cause: Distorted links in project
errors.solution: Use 'Save as with reorganization'

errors.title: Project locked
errors.cause: Project opened by another application during reorganization
errors.solution: Close all applications before reorganizing

errors.title: Data structure error
errors.cause: Project damage from crash/power failure
errors.solution: Create reorganized copy via 'Save as'

errors.title: Data save error
errors.cause: Inconsistent project or storage shortage
errors.solution: Create reorganized copy and check disk space

errors.title: Project data inaccessible
errors.cause: IDB incorrectly defined as GDB
errors.solution: Correct symbol table definition or use 'Save as'

errors.title: Temporary directory exists
errors.cause: SDBDATA directory damaged by crash
errors.solution: Delete SDBDATA directory in S7TEMP

errors.title: Title field preservation
errors.cause: Title field specifications lost during archiving
errors.solution: Manually restore title fields after dearchiving

errors.title: Write-protected files or data blocks
errors.cause: Some files or data blocks are write-protected, possibly due to directory/drive access restrictions or intentional write-protection for reference purposes
solution: Ensure you have write authorization for the drive or folder where the data is located
Close all STEP 7 and WinCC flex editors that might have blocks open
Check Task Manager for remaining S7 processes and close them
Delete project via 'File > Delete' in STEP 7 after closing all applications
If unsuccessful, delete project folder manually in Explorer at: '<Drive>\Program Files\Siemens\Step7\S7Proj\<Project>'
Reboot PC if data areas weren't properly released
Use repair function from STEP 7 CD if files are damaged
For persistent issues, completely uninstall STEP 7 and clean registry as described in FAQ Entry ID 189025

errors.title: Internal error in S7nlvblx.dll
errors.cause: Internal error in the file S7nlvblx.dll
errors.solution: Save your entries and close the application. Switch your computer off/on and restart the application. If the error reoccurs, contact your system administrator.

errors.title: No valid connection path
errors.cause: No valid connection path between local and remote partners (e.g. because of missing network connection or exhausted resources)
errors.solution: HotFix 1 for SP2 clears this problem. This error is still in SP3 at the moment, but will be cleared by another Add On.

errors.title: Loopback connections not allowed
errors.cause: Loopback connections are not permitted
errors.solution: Problem (V4.02 and higher) is cleared with correction release K4.02.5. You can ignore this error message, because the communication functions despite this error message.

errors.title: Internal error occurred
errors.cause: Internal error (Call: AUTReloadObject)
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Unable to reach the module
errors.cause: Unable to reach the module (e.g. 413-2DP) by means of the subnet assigned to the programming device/PC
errors.solution: Under Properties in Options -> Set PG/PC interface, set the local user address to 0 (or the one configured previously).

errors.title: Database write-protected or insufficient memory
errors.cause: The data base is write-protected or there are not enough memory
errors.solution: XREF with V2.1.0 + standard control -> Correction K2.1.3 or higher

errors.title: Modules could not be translated back
errors.cause: Two modules could not be translated back
errors.solution: XREF with V2.1.0 + standard control -> Correction K2.1.3 or higher

errors.title: Button cannot be executed
errors.cause: The selected button can not be executed for the selected menu
errors.solution: Select the block folder and use Options > Reference Data > Display to print reference data for blocks.

errors.title: File occupied by another application
errors.cause: The file is occupied by another application for writing
errors.solution: Close all applications that have opened the symbol table and restart the function.

errors.title: Incorrect object ID
errors.cause: Internal error: Incorrect object ID. The symtabs function has failed - ambiguous entry in the symbol list for FC names
errors.solution: Delete the line for the FC in the symbol table or assign a different DB in the call.

errors.title: No symbol table found
errors.cause: No symbol table found. No symbol could be created
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Error opening file
errors.cause: The file either has no valid B+C287trieve format or it is damaged
errors.solution: Replace the file or delete it

errors.title: Reference data could not be generated
errors.cause: The data medium is write-protected
errors.solution: Remove write-protection or check access rights under NT

errors.title: Reference data could not be generated for SFC14 or FC22
errors.cause: N/A
errors.solution: Use the function 'Save as' together with the option 'With Reorganization (slowly)'

errors.title: Unable to copy block
errors.cause: The OBxy is not supported by the CPU
errors.solution: Use another OBxy with similar function suitable for this CPU

errors.title: Unable to copy block - continue?
errors.cause: A block of this type already exists and it may not be overwritten
errors.solution: Delete the equivalent block in the ONLINE database and repeat the transfer

errors.title: Block being processed by another application
errors.cause: The block is being processed by another application or user
errors.solution: Create a copy of the last version saved or cancel the function

errors.title: TS-Adapter transmission error
errors.cause: The order was interrupted to the TS-Adapter because of transmission error
errors.solution: Modify initialization string in TS adapter to match the modem

errors.title: No compatible modem installed
errors.cause: There is not installed a modem which is compatible with teleservice
errors.solution: Install a suitable modem and set the modem to correspond with your configuration

errors.title: TAPI-Order failure
errors.cause: Communication between PC and modem is not correct
errors.solution: Check connection between PC and modem for hardware/software faults

errors.title: TAPI-subsystem error
errors.cause: TAPI-subsystem dues supply not expected error code <TAPI-Error-Code>
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Instance data block variables mismatch
errors.cause: The variables of the instance data block which contain system attributes for messages are not agree with the variables in the function block
errors.solution: Check the function block and save it again if necessary

errors.title: Data basis could not be started
errors.cause: Occurs when a link is lost in the SYBASE database
errors.solution: Delete the file AMDBASE.LOG or restore the log file using dbsrv50 command

errors.title: Variable cannot be inserted
errors.cause: The name 'Ret_Val' has been assigned to a formal parameter
errors.solution: Rename the 'Ret_Val' parameter in the declaration line

errors.title: OM TD/OP: Data basis conflict
errors.cause: Versions of STEP 7 and ProTool are incompatible
errors.solution: Upgrade STEP 7 to V5.x or install V4.02 of ProTool

errors.title: Opening station failed
errors.cause: N/A
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Unable to insert object
errors.cause: Tried to slot an object that is not available
errors.solution: Select a valid object from the hardware catalog

errors.title: Changes cannot be made
errors.cause: Access to the object is not possible at the moment
errors.solution: Save changes in other applications and ensure sufficient memory

errors.title: Creating configuration data failed
errors.cause: Hard disk is full or folder is write-protected
errors.solution: Free disk space or remove write-protection from S7TMP folder

errors.title: No changes can be made in station
errors.cause: No more modules can be inserted in HW Config
errors.solution: Use 'Save as... with reorganization' for the project

errors.title: Another application made changes
errors.cause: Another S7 application has changed the station
errors.solution: Close and re-open the station

errors.title: System data could not be recreated
errors.cause: Configuration is inconsistent
errors.solution: Check consistency

errors.title: Error programming error diagnostic data
errors.cause: Group message with detailed messages following
errors.solution: Press 'Details' button and analyze detailed messages

errors.title: Application start error
errors.cause: Opening HIGRAPH source with incompatible software versions
errors.solution: Cleared with K4.01.2

errors.title: Configuration file needs recreation
errors.cause: Changes made to configuration require recreation
errors.solution: Use NetPro menu command 'Network > Save and Compile...'

errors.title: Communication to HIGRAPH failed
errors.cause: N/A
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Address incorrect
errors.cause: Selected user address is already occupied
errors.solution: Select another address or connect to another subnetwork

errors.title: Bit rate not supported
errors.cause: 187,5 kbit/s for MBK-P not supported in station
errors.solution: Edit file to use '187.5_supp =1' and execute Options -> UPDATE CATALOG

errors.title: PG/PC interface value not saved
errors.cause: Parameter value could not be saved in database
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Active nodes warning
errors.cause: Other active nodes in station need reloading
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Invalid filename or project
errors.cause: Project stored on network drive with problematic path
errors.solution: Connect share without domain name (\\<Servername>\<share>)

errors.title: Projects cannot be archived
errors.cause: Blocked files preventing archiving
errors.solution: Stop SQL server or hmies.exe process if running

errors.title: Processing status triggered by PKUnZip
errors.cause: Various situations during dearchiving
errors.solution: Most cases can be ignored; check archive file integrity

errors.title: Unable to retrieve project
errors.cause: Archive file might be defective
errors.solution: Use original archiving program or repair with pkzipfix

errors.title: FB not available or invalid data type
errors.cause: Instance declaration missing or invalid data type
errors.solution: Delete and recreate SFBs, check block consistency

errors.title: Registry database incorrect
errors.cause: Registry database not set up correctly for SIMATIC Manager
errors.solution: Reinstall STEP 7

errors.title: Objects cannot be copied to older versions
errors.cause: No downward compatibility from V3 to V2.x
errors.solution: N/A

errors.title: Write-protected medium
errors.cause: Project on write-protected medium
errors.solution: Remove write-protection or obtain write authorization

errors.title: Invalid filename or project
errors.cause: Same as error 3020:13
errors.solution: See instructions for error 3020:13

errors.title: Internet Explorer not installed
errors.cause: STEP 7 installed without Internet Explorer
errors.solution: Install Internet Explorer V4.0 and reinstall STEP 7

errors.title: Diagnostic block creation failed
errors.cause: Standard blocks originate from PLC not library
errors.solution: Delete and reinsert SFBs/SFCs from library

errors.title: Internal error during system error reporting
errors.cause: N/A
errors.solution: Delete Diagnostics-FB49 and DB49, regenerate reference data

errors.title: Inconsistent hardware configuration
errors.cause: Hardware configuration inconsistent or unsaved changes
errors.solution: Make small change and recompile hardware configuration

errors.title: Language resources missing
errors.cause: Resources file for language not installed
errors.solution: Install required language files or reinstall S7-PLCSIM

errors.title: Closing CPU subwindow
errors.cause: Closing subwindow 'CPU' closes simulation session
errors.solution: Keep at least one subwindow open in S7-PLCSIM

errors.title: MPI address change restriction
errors.cause: Cannot change MPI address with active connections
errors.solution: Close all associated applications or disconnect

errors.title: Single simulation restriction
errors.cause: Only one simulated automation system allowed
errors.solution: Opening second system closes first one

errors.title: Cannot exit with active connections
errors.cause: Connection to STEP 7 still active
errors.solution: Close associated applications or clear connection

errors.title: Overall reset warning
errors.cause: MRES deletes all blocks and resets memory
errors.solution: Click 'Yes' to continue or 'No' to abort

errors.title: Simulation not available
errors.cause: Recently used simulation no longer available
errors.solution: Find program or recreate simulation

errors.title: Invalid address format
errors.cause: Address format not supported by STEP 7
errors.solution: Enter address in supported format (IEC or SIMATIC)

errors.title: Invalid value range
errors.cause: Entered value not in valid range for selected format
errors.solution: Enter value in valid format or change field format

errors.title: Non-decimal value
errors.cause: Entered value is not a decimal number
errors.solution: Enter decimal number (e.g. 0, 1, 13)

errors.title: Real CPU communication restriction
errors.cause: Cannot communicate with real CPUs during simulation
errors.solution: Close all simulation windows before going online

errors.title: No connection to FM355/455
errors.cause: Old firmware on the FM
errors.solution: Upgrade the firmware of FM

errors.title: SIMATIC PDM authorization missing
errors.cause: Authorization for integrating SIMATIC PDM in STEP 7 missing
errors.solution: Install additional authorization for integration

errors.title: System error 33
errors.cause: Possible incomplete or incorrect SDB load
errors.solution: Reset CPU module and reload hardware configuration

errors.title: Error creating system SDBs
errors.cause: Missing .err files in RUL folder
errors.solution: Reinstall STEP 7 or copy missing files from another computer

errors.title: Protocol job jam on CPU
errors.cause: N/A
errors.solution: Increase communications load setting for CPU in HW Config

errors.title: Error during module status notice
errors.cause: PQW is being monitored
errors.solution: Monitor values with VAT and wait for new CPUs

errors.title: Reference order not available
errors.cause: Too many control jobs sent to CPU
errors.solution: Acknowledge message and reduce control job frequency

errors.title: Resources error
errors.cause: Job list too full
errors.solution: See error message 33:53346

errors.title: CPU 300 trigger events buildup
errors.cause: CPU 300 does not delete trigger events
errors.solution: Switch CPU off/on. Problem cleared in newer CPUs

errors.title: Time limit exceeded
errors.cause: Communications load too high
errors.solution: Increase CPU communications load from 20% to 50%

errors.title: Coordination rules error
errors.cause: Variable table still open online during system data load
errors.solution: Close variable table and retransfer system data

errors.title: OB cannot be copied
errors.cause: Belonging layer not available
errors.solution: Rename OB or delete in OFFLINE database and retransfer

errors.title: Coordination rules error
errors.cause: Block to be overwritten is still being accessed
errors.solution: Deactivate 'Call path with test/call environment' setting

errors.title: Compilation error in S7-300
errors.cause: Defined variable outside CPU power range
errors.solution: Check addresses with variable definitions

errors.title: Requested information not available
errors.cause: Number of possible connections exceeded
errors.solution: Check connections and reduce where appropriate

errors.title: Protocol incompatibility
errors.cause: Communication software and interface module protocols not compatible
errors.solution: Upgrade CP 443-5 to version >V2.7

errors.title: Profibus/MPI Network diagnostic error
errors.cause: Requested parameter could not be read from register data basis
errors.solution: Firmware/driver error - resolved in SOFTNET PROFIBUS S7 V5.0

errors.title: Incompatible versions
errors.cause: S7OTBLDX.DLL and S7OTBLSX.DLL version mismatch
errors.solution: Close all S7 applications and restart SETUP
